com.mindfusion.charting

Class ZoomController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mindfusion.charting.PlotController
      • com.mindfusion.charting.Plot2DController
        • com.mindfusion.charting.ZoomController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.mindfusion.charting.components.ComponentController

    public class ZoomController
extends Plot2DController
    Represents a controller that zooms into plot's data range.
